item.title: CVE-2021-22853|2024-09-17T04:04:36.098Z -- soar%20cloud%20system%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- hr%20portal
item.description: The HR Portal of Soar Cloud System fails to manage access control. While obtaining user ID, remote attackers can access sensitive data via a specific data packet, such as userâ€™s login information, further causing the login function not to work.
